author: andrewspoooner

text:
Also the upper house is entirely selected by the military - and guess what? They get to pick the Prime Minister. 
That will very likely be the fascistic military dictator, General Prayut. 
So it's not democracy.
author: andrewspoooner

text:
Yep. 
But the last vote was't 7 years ago they were in Feb 2014 when the far-right attacked voters at the polling booths with M16s.
The vote was then staged over two days so the very very dodgy const court invalidated it.
author: andrewspoooner

text: Absolutely 100% right.

text:
I'm done today. 
There's really not much to say when these kinds of horrors get unleashed.
All we can do is mourn and take action to make sure they don't happen again.
author: andrewspoooner

text:
Why can't they just stop with all this? 49 people died and they still don't stop. 
And complaining about making a cheap point whilst making your own??
